name: vocalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ]
  language
  specialized a sound that is produced with the voice, or the act of producing sounds with the voice: Chimpanzees produce vocalizations by alternating the sizes and shapes of their mouths.
[ U ] the act of expressing feelings and ideas in words: the vocalization of positions and perspectives that differ from the Western position
